common.siteDescription: We gather high-quality mathematics learning resources from around the world, providing a comprehensive mathematical knowledge system and learning tools for mathematics enthusiasts, students, and researchers.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Math Resources Repository. All rights reserved.

hero.subtitle: Bringing together global quality mathematics learning resources, providing comprehensive mathematical knowledge systems and learning tools for learners. From basic mathematics to advanced mathematics, from theory to application, making mathematics learning more interesting and efficient.

features.subtitle: We are committed to providing the most qualified and comprehensive learning resources and tools for mathematics learners

branches.subtitle: Explore the different branches of mathematics, from basic concepts to advanced theories

basic.title: Basic Mathematics
basic.description: The foundation branch of mathematics, providing basics for other mathematical fields
basic.arithmeticDesc: Basic operations and properties of numbers

advanced.title: Advanced Mathematics
advanced.description: More in-depth mathematical theories and applications
advanced.calculusDesc: Study of rates of change and accumulation

applied.title: Applied Mathematics
applied.optimizationDesc: Finding the best solution among alternatives
applied.modelingDesc: Using mathematics to represent real systems

theoretical.title: Theoretical Mathematics
theoretical.description: Pure mathematical research and abstract concepts
theoretical.analysisDesc: Rigorous study of real numbers and functions
theoretical.topologyDesc: Properties of space preserved under transformations

learningPath.title: Learning Path
learningPath.subtitle: Choose your learning path based on your current level and interests

footer.description: Your comprehensive resource for mathematics learning and exploration.

examples.title: Mathematical Examples
examples.subtitle: Showcase of classic and important mathematical formulas that have significant meaning in the development and application of mathematics.

quadratic.title: Quadratic Formula
quadratic.description: A general formula used to solve quadratic equations in one variable, where a, b, c are equation coefficients.
quadratic.example: For example: Solve x² - 5x + 6 = 0, where a=1, b=-5, c=6

euler.title: Euler's Formula
euler.description: An important formula that connects exponential functions with trigonometric functions, holding a central position in complex analysis.
euler.example: When θ = π, we get the famous Euler's identity: e^{iπ} + 1 = 0

pythagorean.title: Pythagorean Theorem
pythagorean.description: In a right triangle, the sum of the squares of the two legs equals the square of the hypotenuse, a fundamental theorem in geometry.
pythagorean.example: If the two legs of a right triangle are 3 and 4 respectively, then the hypotenuse length is 5

taylor.title: Taylor Expansion
taylor.description: Expanding a function as a power series around a point, an important tool in calculus.
taylor.example: Taylor expansion of sin(x) at x=0: x - x³/3! + x⁵/5! - x⁷/7! + ...

gaussian.title: Gaussian Integral
gaussian.description: The integral of the Gaussian function over the entire real axis, very important in probability theory and statistics.
gaussian.example: This integral plays a key role in the standardization process of normal distribution

fourier.title: Fourier Transform
fourier.description: Converting time-domain signals to frequency-domain representation, widely used in signal processing and image processing.
fourier.example: Used in fields such as audio compression, image processing, and communication systems

latex.title: More LaTeX Examples
latex.subtitle: Showcasing the powerful functionality of LaTeX in mathematical formula rendering

tools.title: Mathematical Tools
tools.subtitle: Powerful mathematical calculation and visualization tools to help you better understand and apply mathematical concepts. From basic calculations to advanced analysis, meeting various mathematical needs.

external.title: Recommended External Tools
external.subtitle: These are our carefully selected third-party mathematical tools, powerful and professional
external.wolfram: Computational knowledge engine that can solve various mathematical problems
external.desmos: Free online graphing calculator with user-friendly interface
external.geogebra: Dynamic mathematics software supporting geometry, algebra, statistics, etc.
